issue.title: [CF 68] TMW doesn't now recognize bleeding effect
issue.body:
TMW doesn't now recognize bleeding effect from Glyph of Hemorrhage. In the default settings there are Gushing Wound, Rake, etc.. but there is no Glyph of Hemorrhage. Could you please add it?


> Posted by CurseForge user minimen456 | Imported from CurseForge issue #68 | Raw
